overview: WCW hits the road and heads to Sturgis, South Dakota for WCW Road Wild! "Diamond" Dallas Page teams with late night talk show host, Jay Leno, to face Hollywood Hogan & Eric Bischoff. A World Title battle royal features Goldberg, Scott Hall, Kevin Nash, Sting, and more. Rey Misterio Jr. faces Psicosis. Chris Jericho and more!
tagline: No One Knows Where This Road Goes.
title: WCW Road Wild 1998
